lines.text: Maybe taking over a beauty pageant isn't the best way to gain respect.
You better wipe your lip - there's a trace of venom showing.
Don't show your fear, and don't B.S. him.
Sharon Bell - she's like a Bruce Lee with boobs, man!
I don't understand - I kill several innocent people, threaten to blow up a building, and the police still don't take me seriously.
